sentence.text: Recently, the roles of FAM83H in tumorigenesis have been interested and increased expression of FAM83H and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) have been reported.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In conclusion, we present an oncogenic role of FAM83H in liver cancer, which is closely associated with the oncogene negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In hepatic tumor cells derived from Tet-O-MYC epidermis development, the expression of mRNA and protein of FAM83H were dependent on MYC expression.
